|  Variable | Description |
|  --- | --- |

|  [isBoolean](./heuristics.isboolean.md) | Test whether a given value is a Boolean |
|  [isError](./heuristics.iserror.md) | Test whether a given value is an Error |
|  [isFloat](./heuristics.isfloat.md) | Test whether a given value is a floating point number |
|  [isFunction](./heuristics.isfunction.md) | Test whether a given value is a function, including async and generator functions |
|  [isGenerator](./heuristics.isgenerator.md) | Test whether a given value is a generator function |
|  [isNumber](./heuristics.isnumber.md) | Test whether a given value is a number |
|  [isObject](./heuristics.isobject.md) | Test whether a given value is a plain object |
|  [isRegularFunction](./heuristics.isregularfunction.md) | Test whether a given value is a regular function i.e. not async, generator, or anonymous |
|  [isString](./heuristics.isstring.md) | Test whether a given value is a string |
|  [not](./heuristics.not.md) | Convert an expression or value to a negated boolean cast of itself |
|  [notEmpty](./heuristics.notempty.md) | Evaluate whether the given object, array, or string is \_\_not\_\_ empty |
|  [notInPrototype](./heuristics.notinprototype.md) | Determine if a property does \_\_not\_\_ exist on an object or its prototype chain |
|  [notNullOrUndefined](./heuristics.notnullorundefined.md) | Determine whether a given value is \_\_not\_\_ null or undefined |
|  [requires](./heuristics.requires.md) | Require a condition, else throw |
|  [testForEach](./heuristics.testforeach.md) | Generate a function that accepts a test value on which n predicates are enforced |
